package.description:
pr2_clutter_helper
Helpful short functions for trapping an image, pointcloud, transforms from tf, camera_info from the PR2. Used to grab data for the package "gt-ros-pkg/hrl/clutter_segmentation"
Works on bagged data as well (if --clock is published).
Main source file: acquire_pr2_data.py
This collects and formats everythin needed by clutter_svm_segmentation. Also has code to map camera coloring into pointcloud and republish for easy viewing in ROS (Active if run stand-alone).
Also helpful launch files.
package.author: Jason Okerman, Advisors: Prof. Charlie Kemp and Jim Regh, Lab: Healthcare Robotics Lab at Georgia Tech
